basics.name: Bruno Rossani
basics.label: Full Stack Developer | Software Developer
basics.summary: Diligent Full Stack Developer with a strong commitment to excellence and + 1 year of dedicated experience in Back End development. Passionate about crafting sophisticated web applications and solutions that resonate with users and drive business success. Committed to continuous improvement and delivering projects with the utmost effort.

work.name: Freelance
work.summary: Focused on implementing modern web technologies to deliver quality solutions. I have created various websites and applications using a variety of key tools and languages, including HTML, CSS, SASS, JavaScript, PHP, and technologies such as AJAX, MySQL, and Node.js, among others.
highlights: Led the implementation of PayPal payment gateways and token-based authentication systems to ensure transaction security across multiple projects.

Supervised the implementation of web optimization strategies, including lazy loading, caching, and reducing HTTP requests, significantly improving load times and user experience in application development.
Led the development of admin panels, offering efficient content, user, and data management.

education.institution: School of Music at Fine Arts, UDELAR
courses: Applied musical analysis, with solid technical skill in musical execution and outstanding ability to sight-read music.
Notable experience in advanced technical development, standing out for my dexterity and outstanding skills in musical execution.

certificates.name: Complete Web Development with HTML5, CSS3, JS AJAX PHP and MySQL
highlights: Granted by Udemy. This course covers the fundamentals and key technologies for modern web development, including HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, AJAX, PHP, and MySQL.

certificates.name: Preliminary English Test (PET) - Council of Europe Level B1 - Pass with Merit
highlights: Issued by Cambridge English. This certificate demonstrates my English language ability at level B1, validated by the Council of Europe.

projects.description: A Laravel application built with Blade and Tailwind CSS for job search and application.
